titles.title: A resolution designating the week beginning on October 14, 2018, as "National Wildlife Refuge Week".
A resolution designating the week beginning on October 14, 2018, as "National Wildlife Refuge Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Designates the week beginning on October 14, 2018, as National Wildlife Refuge Week.
Acknowledges the importance of national wildlife refuges for their recreational opportunities and contribution to local economies.
Reaffirms the support of the Senate for wildlife conservation and the National Wildlife Refuge System.
